Text:
Thanks for this! I don't get Showtime and I don't have TV where I go to school! I love these guys!

Files are kinda low in quality, but I don't mind that too much. It's all about the info!
Spoke too soon! The second season is lower quality, but seasons 1 and 3 are just dandy!

is dandy good or bad? :P 
i am norwegian hehe:)
I'm from Sri Lanka, what does "a-ok" mean?

vagabonding, "a-ok" means "safe as fuck, mate".

But the thing is, it's not safe as fuck. A lot of the episodes are of very bad quality.

If some of them suck, go ahead and get them, because they're better than nothing, and if you stumble on some better ones, let this guy know, and he'll likely post them.

Now if I could just get past "Locating Sources", I find it funny that I'm sharing to 20+ people at up to 65 KB/s and I can't even get the early seasons of Bullshit to download at even 1 KB/s, hell, not even a fraction.
Can a brother get a quick pass for sharing 1400+ files?
